title: Initial Access
description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad.

title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
description: If the screen locks up (numbers displayed and unresponsive), repeatedly press buttons on the keypad until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This resets the keypad.

title: Reaccessing After Lockup
description: After the screen resets (blank with red blinking light), enter the four-digit code again to access the system.

title: Important Note: Code Entry
description: The four-digit code does not need to be entered in any specific order.

title: Confirmation
description: The system should unlock and grant access.
